pr_title: Update to the latest versions of errorprone, grpc and autovalue

timeline.bodyText:
Is this style change (use an import instead of the full path for a class) imposed by this errorprone update?
Personally, when a class is used only once in a file (such as SpanId here), I see no problem using its full path ;)
timeline.author: carlosalberto

replies.bodyText: yep..and this is one of the errorprone warnings that I actually agree with. I don't think the "never import inner classes" is all that great.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: also, sounds like you need to join the real IDE generation, @carlosalberto .  ;)
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message:
update errorprone, grpc and autovalue
Also, clean up new errorprone warnings

update errorprone, grpc and autovalue
Also, clean up new errorprone warnings
